data.eml:eml: First report of the genus Kisaura Ross (Trichoptera, Philopotamidae) from India with the description of six new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pandher, Manpreet Singh, Saini, Malkiat Singh (2011): First report of the genus Kisaura Ross (Trichoptera, Philopotamidae) from India with the description of six new species. ZooKeys 152: 71-86, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.152.1125, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.152.1125
